translations: 挨户销售，巡回销售；贩卖（非法毒品，偷窃的赃物）；宣传，散布（思想或消息）；忙于琐事

sentences.sentence: His attempts to peddle his paintings around Laramie's tiny gallery scene proved unsuccessful.
sentences.translation: 他在拉勒米的小画廊现场周围兜售其画作的企图证明不成功。

sentences.sentence: One retailer says that although he sells many brands of smartphones, OPPO's generous subsidies make him extra-eager to peddle its wares.
sentences.translation: 一家零售商说，尽管他销售了许多品牌的智能手机，OPPO 的慷慨补贴使他尤其渴望兜售其产品。

sentences.sentence: They even set up their own news agency to peddle anti-isolationist propaganda.
sentences.translation: 他们甚至建立了自己的新闻机构以散布反孤立主义思想。
